RelatedSentence: A family member and an Allegheny County organization stand outside of the Beaver County Courthouse on Monday morning to protest how Eileen Battisti lost her Center Township home in a tax sale .
BEAVER -- Sean Battisti chanted with others Monday morning outside the Beaver County Courthouse to protest how his mother lost her Center Township home .
